CustomField.formula:
IF(TODAY() < End_Date__c,
(5 * ( FLOOR( ( End_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( End_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
-
(5 * ( FLOOR( ( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
, 0) /* End portion of IF */
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For a Phase where the End Date is in the future calculate the number of working days between now until the End Date.
CustomField.label: # Business Days Until End Date
